description: AUTO-DISCOVERY: Get all available reward behaviors from BEHAVIORS.json. Returns all behavior types (hinged, graspable, stackable, etc.) with their properties, descriptions, and units. Pure MOP - reads from source of truth!

returns.behaviors: object mapping behavior names to their property definitions
returns.summary: object with behavior counts and categories

workflow_hints.when_to_use: After discovering assets, learn what reward behaviors can be tracked (stackable, stable, hinged, etc.)

examples.output_summary: Returns 18 behaviors split into object behaviors (hinged, graspable, etc.) and robot behaviors (vision, tactile, etc.)
examples.use_case: To understand what properties can be tracked with ops.add_reward()

best_practices: Use this to understand what reward behaviors are available before adding rewards to scenes
